verbose_text: It was surprising that the tumor selectivity of flavonoids, procyanidins, macrocyclic ellagitannins, hydrolysable tannins, catechins and gallic acid, which has been reported to induce apoptosis, was surprisingly low (TS M = 1 to 5) (green color), as compared with anticancer agents.
evidence: gallic acid, which has been reported to induce apoptosis
